code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import'./WorkExperiance.css';import{WORK_EXPERIENCE}from'../../utilis/data';import ExperianceCard from'./ExperianceCard/ExperianceCard';import Slider from'react-slick';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WorkExperiance=()=>{const slideRef=useRef();const settings={dots:true,infinite:true,speed:500,slidesToShow:2,slidesToScroll:1,arrows:false,responsive:[{breakpoint:769,settings:{slidesToShow:1,slidesToScroll:1}}]};const slideRight=()=>{slideRef.current.slickNext();};const slideLeft=()=>{slideRef.current.slickPrev();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"work-experiance-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Work Experiance"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-experiance-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow-right",onClick:slideRight,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons-outlined",children:"chevron_right"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"arrow-left",onClick:slideLeft,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"material-icons-outlined",children:"chevron_left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slider,{ref:slideRef,...settings,children:WORK_EXPERIENCE.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperianceCard,{details:item},item.title))})]})]});};export default WorkExperiance;
